name: Maracuja Juicy Lip Balm Best Sellers Duo
about: What it is: An iconic maracuja juicy lip duo is all dressed up for the holidays in limited-edition sparkle wrapping for a juicy, hydrated pout. Highlighted Ingredients: - Maracuja Oil: Contains rich in essential fatty acids and vitamin C..- Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers moisture for more supple-looking lips...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. These products are also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: The maracuja juicy lip balm features Cushion Comfort XL Complex for a juicy, plumping effect. It also contains hyaluronic acid and 10 plus superfruits to give you gorgeous and non-sticky feeling stained-glass shine. This formula smooths the look of lip lines for a soft, pillowy pout...This Set Contains:.- 2 x 0.095 oz/ 2.7 g Maracuja Juicy Lip Balms in Rose, Passionfruit
ingredients: -Maracuja Oil: Contains rich in essential fatty acids and vitamin C..-Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers moisture for more supple-looking lips...Rose: .Diisostearyl Malate, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Ceresin, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcrystalline, 1,2-Hexanediol, Fragrance/Parfum, Benzyl Benzoate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Punica Granatum Fruit Extract, Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract, Malpighia Punicifolia (Acerola) Fruit Extract, Passiflora Incarnata Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Fragaria Vesca (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Prunus Persica (Peach) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Juice, Tocopherol. (+/-): Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090)..                                                                                                                                                                                       Passionfruit .Diisostearyl Malate, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Ceresin, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcrystalline, 1,2-Hexanediol, Fragrance/Parfum, Benzyl Benzoate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Punica Granatum Fruit Extract, Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract, Malpighia Punicifolia (Acerola) Fruit Extract, Passiflora Incarnata Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Fragaria Vesca (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Prunus Persica (Peach) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Juice, Tocopherol. (+/-): Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Customizable coverage: click up once, non-retractable click reveals the perfect amount of product every time..-Apply one swipe as a hydrating treatment balm..-Layer for the perfect pop of plumped-up color..-Pro tip: Line lips with Marajuca Juicy Lip Liner (sold separately) for precision application, every time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These leave my lips feeling so hydrated and make them look so juicy and has great pigment. I love the glossy finish and i get compliments every time i wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I got is one sale for $19 which is a SUPER good deal but the full price is still good and could make a great gift. The red is very nice and pigmented and the other one looks more pinky than coral tone in real life contrary to the picture. And another plus is the packaging is gorgeous and so sparkly and doesn’t make a mess!
